Games Programmer/Developer

About Me

Hello, my name is Edd. I am a Games Developer from Dundee.

I graduated from the University of Abertay in 2014 after a four year course studying BSc Computer Games Technology. I'm currently working as a programmer for Stormcloud Games.

If you want to get in contact with me, click here!

You can also follow me on Twitter to keep up with my personal projects

I also have two brothers who are equally talented, Dave who is an artist & 3D animator/modeler and Ben who is a lecturer in Computer Science at Bournemouth University.
